p: Vero E6 cell line (commonly used cell line originally obtained from European Collection of Authenticated Cell Cultures, previously described in ref. 53) was grown in Dulbecco's modified Eagle’s medium (DMEM) supplemented with 10% fetal calf serum (FCS). HuH7-Lunet-T7 cells ( 54), which stably express T7 RNA polymerase, were obtained from R. Bartenschlager and were grown in DMEM supplemented with 2 mM l-glutamine, nonessential amino acids, and 10% FCS. All cell lines were grown at 37 °C with 5% CO 2 unless otherwise stated.
